articles.description: Tommy Prine is the youngest of John Prine's sons, and he's about to release his debut album, "This Far South," with some of Nashville's best.
articles.content: For now, though, its Thursday, March 16, and hes about to go on stage at The Basement East, a small but important Nashville club where he used to work the door. Hes playing there each Thursday in Mar… [+358 chars]
